Let’s Talk

BrightLink Quote App

Overview

The Brightlink Quote App is a custom Shopify application built to manage and automate the quote generation process for Brightlink’s LED product business. It is developed using the modern React and Remix framework and styled with Shopify Polaris, ensuring a responsive, fast, and accessible user experience.

The app integrates directly with Shopify’s product and customer APIs, allowing users to create product bundles, apply discounts, assign salespeople, and manage quotes — all in one unified system. It also provides PDF export functionality, advanced analytics, and commission tracking, making it an essential tool for both administrators and sales teams.

Designed as a complete sales management solution, the Brightlink Quote App enables the team to move from manual quoting to a structured, scalable, and automated workflow that improves both internal efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Problem

Before this app was developed, Brightlink’s quoting process was largely manual and fragmented. Sales representatives used spreadsheets and email templates to create quotes, which often led to inconsistent pricing, missing information, and delayed responses. Custom product groupings and discounts had to be calculated by hand, leaving room for human error.

There was no centralized system to manage customer interactions, assign quotes to team members, or track revisions and approvals. Sales performance and commission calculations were also tracked manually, which made reporting time-consuming and often inaccurate. As the business grew, these inefficiencies became more pronounced and limited the company’s ability to scale its operations effectively.

The absence of a reliable, automated quoting system was not only affecting internal productivity but also negatively impacting the customer experience, with longer response times and less professionalism in communications.

Solution

To resolve these challenges, I developed a full-featured, modular Shopify app that digitized and optimized Brightlink’s entire quote workflow. The application includes a multi-step quote builder, enabling users to select products (including variants), add custom-priced items, apply discounts, and review totals before finalizing the quote.

Quotes can be assigned to specific salespeople, tracked through different statuses (pending, approved, rejected, etc.), and exported as professional PDFs. Each quote maintains a complete history for audit purposes, along with internal comment threads for team collaboration.

The app also includes a dashboard module that shows real-time analytics such as sales volume, commission breakdowns, and recent activity. A dedicated customer management system allows Brightlink to create profiles, apply tiered pricing, manage addresses, and view quote histories.

With deep Shopify integration, mobile responsiveness, and a clean UI powered by Polaris, the Brightlink Quote App transforms a once-manual process into an efficient, professional, and scalable sales tool.
